Advanced resuscitation techniques make it possible to maintain some vital functions of moribund patients in a state of suspended animation, allowing them to be kept alive despite not being able to heal underlying disease processes or die naturally. (NOTE: This is not the same as true life, but it is a state where death

The challenge lies in determining when to apply life-sustaining technology and when the potential benefit outweighs the risk, as these patients are neither truly alive nor able to die naturally as long as essential functions are maintained. (Text)

Setsapp is a Cytoscape 3 application that provides tools for defining and maintaining sets of nodes or edges, and comparing those sets using standard set operations (union, intersection, difference). It integrates with the Cytoscape command system and can be accessed by other Cytoscape apps through this integration

Setsapp provides the set operations of union, intersection, and difference. These can be invoked using Cytoscape commands by using the corresponding commands with Setsapp selected in the Cytoscape application. For example, "setsapp union selectedSets resultSet" to perform a set union operation.
